question_text: Which of the following symptoms are likely caused by backlight failure rather than GPU or LCD panel damage? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Dim screen with usable image when lit externally
Display works on external monitor, but laptop screen is black
Screen flashes briefly on boot and then turns black
Visible dead pixels or lines across the screen
correct_answer: Dim screen with usable image when lit externally
Display works on external monitor, but laptop screen is black
Screen flashes briefly on boot and then turns black
explanation: These symptoms indicate the screen image is still rendering but not illuminated â€” a hallmark of backlight failure.
